abstract: NASA is looking to accelerate plans to send astronauts to distant destinations by considering a proposal to put fuel depots in orbit.
snippet: If NASA can refuel spacecraft in orbit, it might be able to accelerate plans to send astronauts to distant destinations.
lead_paragraph: If NASA can refuel spacecraft in orbit, it might be able to accelerate plans to send astronauts to distant destinations.

headline.main: NASA Is Considering Fuel Depots in the Skies
headline.print_headline: Space Agency Is Considering Fuel Depots In the Skies
headline.seo: NASA Is Considering Fuel Depots in the Skies
